name: Sphere of Annihilation
i: "The power of void is mine to evoke" x3
e:
Sphere of Annihilation will have one of the following effects on the object first struck:
1. A weapon hit is destroyed
2. A shield hit is subject to Shield Destroying
3. A player hit dies and is Cursed
n: Ignores armor. Enchantments which affect equipment, such as Imbue Shield or Harden, do not function against Sphere of Annihilation
